name: PRASHANT KUMAR
about: As a Computer Vision and Machine learning enthusiast with  2+ years of hands-on experience in the industry I bring a unique blend of academic excellence and practical experience to the field. With a solid foundation in Interdisciplinary speclization of Electrical Engineering ,Computer Science & Medical Science from the prestigious Indian Institute of Technology (IIT),Kharagpur. I'm committed to making a positive impact in multi domain AI application through advanced technology.

experience.title: Associate Scientist-Image Analyst
experience.description: Digital Pathology Team in Translation Medicine group at Biocon Bristol Myer Squibb R&D Center(BBRC)

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: • Developed an Deep Learning Algorithm  that can accurately segment Pneumothorax with 0.83 Dice Coefficient and classify various diseases from Chest X-ray images.• Developed an algorithm to create a pipeline for converting Unstructured ECG Paper EMR data into a structured data format.
experience.description_html: • Developed an Deep Learning Algorithm that can accurately segment Pneumothorax with 0.83 Dice Coefficient and classify various diseases from Chest X-ray images.• Developed an algorithm to create a pipeline for converting Unstructured ECG Paper EMR data into a structured data format. <!---->

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
experience.description: • Designed and Presented lectures that centered around using Image Processing and Deep Learning techniques to analyze and understand the physics of different medical imaging modalities.
